Careers

We use multiple liquidity providers from Tier 1 Banks and institutions to give you competitive quotes on a wide range of instruments.

  • BOUNS
  • GIFT REWARDS
  • DEPOSIT REWARDS

Your Role

BCR now has exciting opportunities for reliable, ambitious, and self-motivated salespeople to be part of team while the Company is undergoing a major global expansion. If you are truly passionate for Sales or Finance, this role could be for you.

For the right candidate, you will have:

  • Strong written and verbal communication skills in English and Mandarin
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Approx. 2-3 months Internship period
  • At least 2 days per week of availability
  • Willingness to learn professional skills/knowledge in the FX market
  • Enthusiasm in the financial market
  • Sales experience is an advantage

Key Responsibilities

  • Assist client’s needs with enhanced skills and knowledge
  • Correspond with current clients on a daily basis for additional needs and create referrals
  • Keep up-to-date with the financial markets and current affairs
  • Learn trading techniques including fundamental and technical analysis
  • Create and support company's branding and marketing strategy
  • Write daily trading report about the forex trend

What you get in return:

  • Potential full-time/part-time opportunities with competitive base salary.
  • Attractive uncapped commission.
  • Work in an industry that is booming – massive earning potential.
  • A well-presented working experience to be included in your CV.
  • Assistance of building-up your desired career in the financial market.
  • Overseas travel opportunity
  • Darling Harbour location with an enjoyable work environment

Your Role

BCR now has exciting opportunities for reliable, ambitious, and self-motivated salespeople to be part of team while the Company is undergoing a major global expansion. If you are truly passionate for Sales or Finance, this role could be for you.

For the right candidate, you will have:

  • Competitive remuneration based on experience
  • Sydney based top-class office working environment
  • Overseas travel opportunity
  • At least 2 days per week of availability
  • Willingness to learn professional skills/knowledge in the FX market
  • Enthusiasm in the financial market
  • Sales experience is an advantage

Your Role

BCR now has exciting opportunities for reliable, ambitious, and self-motivated salespeople to be part of team while the Company is undergoing a major global expansion. If you are truly passionate for Sales or Finance, this role could be for you.

For the right candidate, you will have:

  • Competitive remuneration based on experience
  • Truly UNCAPPED COMMISSION potential
  • Sydney CBD location with WORK HARD, PLAY HARD culture
  • Overseas travel opportunity
  • Ongoing training and support

Key Responsibilities

  • Work towards specific KPI's (monthly sales target)
  • Ability to identify and generate client pipelines on your own
  • Convert prospective warm leads into new clients and communicate our company's products and benefits effectively
  • Assist clients needs with enhanced skills and knowledge
  • Ability to work under pressure

Requirements and Skills

  • Strong written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Native Vietnamese Speaker
  • A sales focused attitude
  • Independence and discipline; a self-motivated starter who works autonomously to map out your own day
  • CFD/Forex sales experience will be a plus but not essential
  • Experience of using MT4 platforms will be a plus but not essential
  • Preferably RG146 qualified
  • Graduates are welcome

Your Role

SEM (Search Engine Marketing) Specialist will contribute to the planning, creation, execution, and evaluation of integrated marketing campaigns for both domestic and international lead generation. In addition to data analysis, SEM is also required to optimise keyword searches and coordinate with other departments to achieve the company's overall marketing objectives.

Job description

  • Execute tests, collect and analyse data, identify trends and insights in order to achieve maximum ROI in paid search campaigns
  • Research and analyze competitor advertising links
  • Perform ongoing paid keyword discovery, expansion and optimization
  • Optimize copy and landing pages for paid search engine marketing campaigns
  • Track, report and analyze website and campaigns analytics
  • Perform ongoing organic or paid keyword discovery, expansion and optimization
  • Work with content specialists to implement keywords, optimize web content and social media, and create new content pieces

Requirements and Skills

  • Prior experience running SEM & SMM campaigns
  • At least one-year digital marketing experience
  • Strong understanding of Google and Facebook Ads
  • Experience in Forex, Trading and CDFs industry is highly preferred
  • Analytical skills and experience generating SEM reports
  • Excellent written and spoken English
  • Experience with Google Marketing Platform including (Analytics, Data Studio and etc)

Requirements and Skills

  • Strong written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Native Vietnamese Speaker
  • A sales focused attitude
  • Independence and discipline; a self-motivated starter who works autonomously to map out your own day
  • CFD/Forex sales experience will be a plus but not essential
  • Experience of using MT4 platforms will be a plus but not essential
  • Preferably RG146 qualified
  • Graduates are welcome

OUR TEAM

Where We Work

MoneyLion is headquartered in New York City, with offices in Sioux Falls, and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, and we also support remote team members around the globe.
